Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 45th overall pick, by Chicago in 2017...
Traded from Chicago to Colorado on 7/31/2017 (Going to COL: P Eric Boyd, P Leandro Balan, P Floyd Alcantara. Going to CHI: LF Hilario Suazo)...
Injured on 8/4/2017 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/9/2018 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/2018 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/11/2019 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 9/4/2019...
Injured on 8/10/2020 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 9/30/2021 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 3/31/2022 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 8/5/2023.
Had first career hit on 8/23/2023, off Billy Landwehr (KC)...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Atlanta on 8/25/2024.
